external_games.name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - New Adventure Volume 2: "Danger Mountain March #1~#3"

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - New Adventure Volume 2: Danger Mountain March 1- 3
summary: Description: A new adventure in the Dia Earthlands, featuring three brand new quests! Kiesel and Lazuli take center stage as main characters! Just what kind of chaos unfolds as Lazuli undergoes a rigorous training regiment?
